message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will bring you a lot of value. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it would bring to me. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $9000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $10500. I think this price reflects the value the product will bring to you, and I'm willing to negotiate further if you're still interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $10000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $11000. I think this price is still a good deal for both of us, and I'm open to further negotiation if you're still interested.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm getting close to my budget limit. I'm willing to go up to $10800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your willingness to push the price up to $10800, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $11200. I think this price is fair considering the value the product will bring to you, and I'm willing to negotiate further if you're still interested.
